comment: I absolutely love him, if u need an easy A take the class with him. He is very chill when it comes to grading and he is also probably the most understanding professor i've had. He cares about all of his students well-being over homework or things related to school. There are 4 essays with easy prompts, and group assignments are easy too

Professor Sillitti is the best. He only assigned 4 essays and a few group projects that were super easy. He's not a harsh grader at all and he is very caring and does great with engaging with his students. Sometimes the lessons can be boring, but it's not a hard class at all. I highly recommend taking his class.

This professor is SO SWEET and you are graded by 4 essays. The class notes and lectures can be boring but he does a great job at keeping his students entertained. He grades fair, and it is more of a completion class.. Take him!!!!

comment: TAKE HIM!! Class is low effort. 4 essays (you choose prompts & it's easy) with extra credit. Very caring of his students and accessible outside of class. He personally greets and speaks to every student. 3 excused absences but understanding. Textbook required but not hard reading. Goes over in class with PowerPoint, but I barely take notes.
